description: Tests the search bar functionality to ensure users can find specific products in the 'Men' category.
steps: Locate the search bar input field.
Type 'ATID Blue Shoes' into the search bar.
Click the 'Search' button to execute the query.
Verify that the search results display the correct product.
Type 'Denim Jeans' into the search bar.
Verify that the search results display all relevant products containing 'Denim Jeans'.
Ensure no unrelated products are displayed.
expected_results: Search results match the entered query.
Unrelated products are excluded from search results.
edge_cases: Search button does not execute correctly.
No results are displayed for valid queries.
Partial matches are not included in the results.
Search bar does not reset after clearing input.
data_requirements: Products with diverse names containing keywords.
Configuration for partial and exact matches.
api_interactions: GET request to fetch search results based on query.
performance_metrics: Time taken to display search results.
accessibility_requirements: Search button accessible via screen readers.
Verify input field has sufficient color contrast.
